title: Ballots went missing the same day a woman found 250 in Amazon package
shortDescription: Maine is investigating a claim that hundreds of blank ballots for this year's November election were delivered to a woman in her Amazon order.

title: Diddy asked Trump for a pardon, the president says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters in the Oval Office that Sean "Diddy" Combs requested a pardon after his conviction in federal sex crimes.

title: Trump says he is open to invoking Insurrection Act
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters he’d invoke the Insurrection Act "if it was necessary."

title: Trump troops headed for Chicago. 'Invasion of Illinois,' gov says
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge April M. Perry is allowing the Trump administration to proceed with plans to deploy troops to Illinois, for now.

title: Trump's Guard deployments in limbo in Portland, Chicago amid suits
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked President Donald Trump from sending the National Guard to Portland, and his Chicago orders face another legal challenge.

title: Trump says he would invoke the Insurrection Act 'if it was necessary'
shortDescription: Trump said he would consider invoking the Insurrection Act to deploy the military into cities if courts block his deployment of National Guard troops.

title: Trump says he's open to extending Obamacare subsidies to end shutdown
shortDescription: Democrats expressed skepticism that Trump is actually willing to negotiate, which the White House and congressional Republicans have publicly refused.

title: GOP leans on 'sick' Democrat's texts to shake up Va. races
shortDescription: Democratic attorney general nominee Jay Jones' messages joking about killing a Republican lawmaker might upend the Old Dominion's race for governor.

title: When is the next shutdown vote in the Senate? Watch live
shortDescription: The Senate will reconvene for a vote on Monday, Oct. 6 to reopen the federal government. Watch the proceedings live.

title: Adin Ross streamed with Trump in 2024. Now he's remorseful on politics
shortDescription: President Donald Trump appeared with livestream star Adin Ross in 2024. Barron Trump suggested it, but Ross said he wishes he didn't get into politics

title: Trump promises miliary pay raises amid shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Melania Trump attended "Titans of the Sea: A Salute to the Fleet" at Naval Station Norfolk.

title: More Americans blame Trump, Republicans for shutdown, new poll
shortDescription: A new poll found that more Americans blame President Donald Trump and Republicans for the federal government shutdown than Democrats.

title: President Trump weighs in on Jay Jones' 'two bullets to the head' text message
shortDescription: President Donald Trump joined in on Sunday morning calling Jay Jones "Radical Left Lunatic" in a post on Truth Social.

title: Trump’s Portland troop order blocked
shortDescription: Federal judge halts President Donald Trump’s National Guard deployment to Portland for the second time amid protests.

title: Government shutdown updates: Senate rejects spending deals
shortDescription: The government shutdown is approaching a full week, and lawmakers don't seem any closer to a funding deal.

title: Trump urges Democrat Jay Jones to drop out of Virginia's AG race
shortDescription: The reported texts come to light at a time when a poll found that most Americans believe brash political rhetoric is contributing to violence.

title: Trump supports 'across-the-board pay raises' for U.S. military members
shortDescription: Trump's speech took place amid a government shutdown as military personnel work without pay and thousands of federal employees are furloughed.

title: US judge blocks Trump from sending any National Guard troops to Portland, Oregon
shortDescription: Gov. Gavin Newsom previously said he would sue the Trump administration over the deployment of 300 California National Guard personnel to Oregon.
